graphics
Class ImageLibrary

java.lang.Object
  graphics.ImageLibrary

public class ImageLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
kbok Provides a library of Images used for graphics that is independent of the format of graphics data, implementation and loading state.

getImage

public static java.awt.Image getImage(Unit u,
                                      Orientation o)
Returns the graphical representation of a unit, given a Unit object and an Orientation.

Parameters:
u - The Unit object to represent.
o - The current orientation of this unit.
Returns:
an Image that can be used to draw the unit.
